name: Backend Developer Roadmap
description: Complete guide to becoming a backend developer, covering server-side programming, databases, APIs, and system design

milestones.title: Master a Backend Language
milestones.description: Learn a server-side programming language like Python, Java, Node.js, or Go. Focus on syntax, data structures, and OOP concepts.

milestones.title: Database Management
milestones.description: Understand relational and NoSQL databases. Learn SQL, database design, indexing, and transactions.

milestones.title: APIs & Web Services
milestones.description: Build RESTful APIs, understand HTTP protocols, authentication, and API best practices.

milestones.title: System Design & Scalability
milestones.description: Learn to design scalable systems, caching strategies, load balancing, and microservices architecture.

name: Frontend Developer Roadmap
description: Path to becoming a modern frontend developer with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks

milestones.title: HTML & CSS Fundamentals
milestones.description: Master semantic HTML, CSS layouts, Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design principles.

milestones.title: JavaScript Essentials
milestones.description: Learn modern JavaScript (ES6+), DOM manipulation, async programming, and browser APIs.

milestones.title: Frontend Framework
milestones.description: Choose and master a modern framework like React, Vue, or Angular for building dynamic UIs.

milestones.title: Build Tools & Deployment
milestones.description: Learn version control, build tools, testing, and deployment strategies.

name: AI/ML Roadmap
description: Comprehensive guide to artificial intelligence and machine learning from basics to advanced topics

milestones.title: Mathematics Foundation
milestones.description: Build strong foundation in linear algebra, calculus, probability, and statistics.

milestones.title: Python & ML Libraries
milestones.description: Master Python and essential ML libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.

milestones.title: Core ML Algorithms
milestones.description: Understand supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, model evaluation, and feature engineering.

milestones.title: Deep Learning & Deployment
milestones.description: Learn advanced neural networks, computer vision, NLP, and model deployment.
